00029 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00030 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldDelegate import *
00031 from Koo.Common.Numeric import *
00032 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00033 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00034 
00035 
00036 class FloatFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget):
00037         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00038                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00039 
00040                 self.widget = QLineEdit(self)
00041                 self.widget.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Preferred, QSizePolicy.Fixed )
00042                 layout = QHBoxLayout( self )
00043                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00044                 layout.addWidget( self.widget )
00045 
00046                 self.installPopupMenu( self.widget )
00047                 self.connect( self.widget, SIGNAL('editingFinished()'), self.calculate )
00048                 self.digits = attrs.get('digits', None)
00049 
00050         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00051                 AbstractFieldWidget.setReadOnly(self, value)
00052                 self.widget.setReadOnly( value )
00053 
00054         def calculate(self):
00055                 val = textToFloat( str(self.widget.text() ) )
00056                 self.setText( floatToText( val, self.digits) )
00057                 self.modified()
00058 
00059         def value(self):
00060                 return textToFloat( str(self.widget.text()) )
00061 
00062         def store(self):
00063                 self.record.setValue( self.name, self.value() )
00064 
00065         def clear(self):
00066                 self.setText( floatToText(0, self.digits) )
00067                 
00068         def showValue(self):
00069                 if self.record.value(self.name):
00070                         self.setText( floatToText( self.record.value(self.name), self.digits ) )
00071                 else:
00072                         self.clear()
00073 
00074         def colorWidget(self):
00075                 return self.widget
00076 
00077         def setText(self, text):
00078                 self.widget.setText( text )
00079                 self.widget.setCursorPosition( 0 )
00080 
00081 class FloatFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00082         def setModelData(self, editor, model, index):
00083                 value = textToFloat( unicode( editor.text() ) )
00084                 model.setData( index, QVariant( value ), Qt.EditRole )
